# eclectic

Miscellaneous R functions. Inspired by https://github.com/kylebittinger/kylemisc.

So far:

- reading blast format 6 output files
- creating named vector
- subsetting and pruning count matrices
- ggplot2 version of qiimer::saturated_rainbow (counts & proportions)
